en-GB.exit%d: Quit Steam entirely, shutting down its processes
en-GB.flushconfig%d: Flush and reload all app configurations
en-GB.friends/status/play: Set status to Looking to Play
en-GB.friends/status/trade: Set status to Looking to Trade
en-GB.open/minigameslist%d: Shrink the Steam window to show just a list of your games
en-GB.open/screenshots/%a%d: Show your local recordings and screenshots for %a
en-GB.open/servers%d: Open the server list and connect to a game server
en-GB.open/tools%d: Switch the Library view to show all installable dedicated tools
en-GB.settings/account%d: Add funds to your account and change your privacy settings
en-GB.settings/downloads%d: Set your download region and configure automatic updates
en-GB.settings/friends%d: Change how you appear to others and how they appear in your friends list
en-GB.settings/ingame%d: Configure the Steam Overlay, the FPS counter and screenshotting
en-GB.settings/interface%d: Change Steam's language, participate in a beta, and more
en-GB.settings/voice%d: Configure your voice input/output devices and transmission options
en-GB.store%d: View the Steam Store to see your latest game recommendations
en-GB.url/CommunityFriendsThatPlay/%a%d: Your friends that are playing, have played or want %a
en-GB.url/CommunityHome%d: Home for community and official content for all games and software on Steam
en-GB.url/CommunityItemInfo/%d: View the items you've collected for games with in-game items
en-GB.url/FamilySharing%d: Allow selected accounts to use your game library on authorised computers
en-GB.url/GameHub/%a%d: See the most popular community and official content for %a
en-GB.url/LegalInformation%d: View Steam's copyright policies and legal notices
en-GB.url/MyHelpRequests%d: Your latest help requests sent to Steam Support
en-GB.url/ParentalSetup%d: Restrict access to content and features while in a PIN-protected Family View
en-GB.url/PrivacyPolicy%d: View how Steam handles user data
en-GB.url/SteamIDFriendsPage%d: View new games, achievements and posts of your friends
en-GB.url/SteamWorkshop%d: Create, discover, and download content for Steam games
en-GB.url/SteamWorkshopPage/%a%d: Create, discover, and download content for %a
en-GB.url/StoreAccount%d: Your Steam account details and settings
en-GB.url/StoreCart%d: Review and purchase items in your cart
en-GB.validate/%a%d: Verify the integrity of the game's files to ensure they're installed correctly
en-GB.viewfriendsgame/%f%d: View the details of and join %f's game and connected server
en-GB.update_cache%d: Updates the cache of the Steam extension, bypassing wait times
en-GB.clear_cache%d: Clears the cache of the Steam extension
en-GB.rebuild_cache%d: Completely rebuilds the cache of the Steam extension
en-GB.no_results%d: No results found that match your search
